games.name: Red Dead Redemption 2
games.description: An open-world western action-adventure game set in the American frontier. Play as Arthur Morgan, an outlaw in the dying days of the Wild West. Features stunning landscapes, realistic horse riding, and immersive storytelling.

games.name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
games.description: Embark on a legendary Viking saga as Eivor in 9th century England. Build settlements, forge alliances, and lead raids in this epic action RPG that blends history with mythology.

games.description: A multiplayer social deduction game where players work together on a spaceship while trying to identify impostors among the crew. Features deception, teamwork, and quick rounds perfect for party gaming.

games.description: A team-based hero shooter featuring diverse heroes with unique abilities. Fight for the future in 6v6 battles across iconic locations in this fast-paced competitive FPS.
